jobActivity.title: information to Chester for application through web site
jobActivity.body:
Hello,
I have applied the position through https://www.aplitrak.com/?adid=Y2hlc3Rlci5hbGxlbi4wODUxMy41NDAzQGxhZm9zc2UuYXBsaXRyYWsuY29t . But I am not sure if my application successfuly submitted due to latency from server side. (suspicion : an issue may happen during submitting form).
sorry for any inconvenience caused
regards,
Muhammet Atalay B&B Technologies Ltd. mobile: +44 (0) 7721 608414
